column1: depreciation of the rupee relative to other currencies is reflected by a rise/fall in the

values of the effective exchange rate indices.
(q)    CCPI is used for the computation of the Real Effective Exchange Rate (REER). The REER 
is  computed  by  adjusting  the  Nominal  Effective  Exchange  Rate  (NEER)  for  inflation 
differentials with the countries whose currencies are included in the basket.
